trackFilterList.clickToChange:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for an icon indicating the dropdown can be opened
**UI Location**: Mentoring Queue → Track Filter (Current track dropdown button)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the current track filter, especially with assistive technologies
**Technical Context**: Used as `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component. Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Click to change"
trackFilterList.changeTheTracksYouMentor:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to open a modal for changing mentored tracks
**UI Location**: Mentoring Queue → Track Filter (Dropdown list item)
**When Users See This**: When the track filter dropdown is open
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Change the tracks you mentor"
